title: Ladakh - The Land Of High Passes (Crazzy Paul)
text: By Crazzy Paul Aug 9, 2015 India is a land of diversified culture. It consists of numerous cities having its own unique and distinct taste. There are cities which host beautiful beaches, others having scenic mountains and others with its own exotic beauty. There is a place to visit in India throughout the year, either for its historical significance or for its rich flora and fauna. It's a country having numerous tourist attractions to choose from. Trekking in India provides for many places and Ladakh is one such place giving trekkers an opportunity to do so.Trekking in Ladakh, is a life time experience for adventure lovers and one of the most favorite trekking destinations having picturesque and challenging treks. Ladakh is a paradise for adventure comprising of the Great Himalaya and the Karakoram and ranges like the Ladakh and the Zaskar range. The treks from Spituk to the Markha valley and Lamayuru gompa to Chilling village alongside the Zaskar range are the most popular treks in the region.The best time to trek is from June end to mid October. There are many Adventure Trekking Tour in Ladakh which offer trek packages along with guide, pack horses, food and supplies.Trekking in Ladakh offers trekkers to explore beautiful snow clad mountain peaks along with translucent lakes and breathtaking terrains. It is one of the most famous adventure sports for those who are thrilled and fascinated by the unexplored. The mountain ranges of the Himalaya offer life-trotting activities for trekking tours, mountaineering and river rafting tours. Adventure Trekking Tour in Ladakh also provides for Home stay as well as Camping experience. The treks are divided into easy moderate and tough treks depending upon the experience of the trekkers. Easy treks incude Sham Trek (07 Days), Spituk Trekking (06Days), Moderate treks include Manali Ladakh Trekking (23 Days), Markha Valley Trek (11 Days), and Tough treks include Hemis Rupsu Darsha Trekking (21 Days), Stok Kangri Trekking (18 Days). There are also open tours like Spituk to Stok Trek, Zingchen to Chilling Trek, Challung Do to Nidder Trek and many more.There are no such hardships faced while traveling to Ladakh as commuters may opt for Air, Rail or the Road. However, the road trip is also the most sought after route by many, mostly the adventure lovers. The region has the most picture perfect scenic beauty and is undoubtedly the most sought after tourist destination specially for trekkers. Trekking in Ladakh is undoubtedly one of the best places for Trekkers and Travelers. Trekking in Ladakh truly gives adventure lovers a chance to get up close to nature's wonders and get a closer feel of the inside region.
